name: Pydantic AI Agents
description: A2A agents built with PydanticAI and FastA2A for type-safe, production-grade agent servers with minimal boilerplate.

agentNotes.pydantic-fasta2a: Core framework converting any PydanticAI agent into A2A server
agentNotes.code-agent: Type-safe code generation and review with PydanticAI
agentNotes.data-agent: Data analysis and visualization with strict type validation
agentNotes.research-agent: Research and information gathering with structured PydanticAI outputs
agentNotes.planning-agent: Project planning and workflow optimization with type-safe schemas
